languages.text: Когда разъяренный культ Губительной жажды карал всех, кто помогал Вольному Торговцу, изменнику по кличке Комиссар чудом удалось уцелеть. Заключая омерзительные сделки и откупаясь чужими жизнями, он обрел новых покровителей. Еще много подданных Бога-Императора, имевших несчастье оказаться в Темном городе, стало жертвами его гнусных манипуляций.

When the enraged Cult of the Fatal Thirst punished everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader, the traitor known as the Commissar survived against all odds. Making despicable deals and buying his own life with the lives of others, he found new benefactors. Many more subjects of the God-Emperor who had the misfortune of finding themselves in the Dark City became victims of his vile manipulations.
languages.original_text: Когда разъяренный культ Губительной жажды карал всех, кто помогал Вольному Торговцу, изменнику по кличке Комиссар чудом удалось уцелеть. Заключая омерзительные сделки и откупаясь чужими жизнями, он обрел новых покровителей. Еще много подданных Бога-Императора, имевших несчастье оказаться в Темном городе, стало жертвами его гнусных манипуляций.

traits.locale_text: When the infuriated cult of the Fatal Thirst punished everyone who helped the Rogue Trader, the traitor known as the Commissar survived against all odds. Making vicious deals and paying his life off with the lives of others, he found new patrons. Many more subjects of the God-Emperor who had the misfortune to find themselves in the Dark City became victims of his vile machinations.

Many more subjects of the God-Emperor who had the misfortune to find themselves in the Dark City became victims of his vile machinations.

When the enraged Cult of the Fatal Thirst punished everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader, the traitor known as the Commissar survived against all odds. Making despicable deals and buying his own life with the lives of others, he found new benefactors. Many more subjects of the God-Emperor who had the misfortune of finding themselves in the Dark City became victims of his vile manipulations.

languages.text: 致命饥渴教派的巫灵怒不可遏，对所有帮助过行商浪人的人进行了惩罚，但这位被称为“政委”的叛徒却顽强地活了下来。他靠着卑鄙的交易，用别人的生命来换取自己的生命，还找到了新的赞助者。越来越多不幸落入黑暗之城的神皇仆人沦为了他邪恶计划的受害者。
languages.original_text: When the enraged Cult of the Fatal Thirst punished everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader, the traitor known as the Commissar survived against all odds. Making despicable deals and buying his own life with the lives of others, he found new benefactors. Many more subjects of the God-Emperor who had the misfortune of finding themselves in the Dark City became victims of his vile manipulations.

traits.locale_text: 致命饥渴教派的巫灵怒不可遏，对所有帮助过行商浪人的人进行了惩罚，但这位被称为“政委”的叛徒却顽强地活了下来。他靠着卑鄙的交易，用别人的生命来换取自己的生命，还找到了新的赞助者。越来越多不幸落入黑暗之城的神皇仆人沦为了他邪恶阴谋的受害者。

languages.text: Als der zornige Kult des Fatalen Dursts jeden bestrafte, der {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} geholfen hatte, überlebte der Verräter namens Kommissar erstaunlicherweise. Er ging schändliche Handel ein und erkaufte sich sein eigenes Leben mit dem anderer. So fand er neue Gönner. Noch viele weitere Untertanen des Gottimperators, die das Pech hatten, in der Dunklen Stadt zu landen, wurden zu Opfern seiner schändlichen Machenschaften.
languages.original_text: When the enraged Cult of the Fatal Thirst punished everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader, the traitor known as the Commissar survived against all odds. Making despicable deals and buying his own life with the lives of others, he found new benefactors. Many more subjects of the God-Emperor who had the misfortune of finding themselves in the Dark City became victims of his vile manipulations.

traits.locale_text: Als der zornige Kult des Fatalen Dursts jeden bestrafte, der {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} geholfen hatte, überlebte der Verräter namens Kommissar erstaunlicherweise. Er ging schändliche Handel ein und erkaufte sich sein eigenes Leben mit dem anderer. So fand er neue Gönner. Noch viele weitere Unteretanen des Gottimperators, die das Pech hatten, in der Dunklen Stadt zu landen, wurden zu Opfern seiner schändlichen Machenschaften.

languages.text: Lorsque le Culte de la Soif Fatale, excédé, punit tous ceux qui avaient aidé {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, le commissaire parvint à survivre contre toute attente. Il conclut des marchés abjects et échangea de nombreuses vies contre la sienne afin de se procurer le soutien de nouveaux bienfaiteurs. Bon nombre des sujets de l'Empereur-Dieu qui eurent le malheur de se retrouver dans la Cité Crépusculaire furent victimes de ses odieuses manipulations.
languages.original_text: When the enraged Cult of the Fatal Thirst punished everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader, the traitor known as the Commissar survived against all odds. Making despicable deals and buying his own life with the lives of others, he found new benefactors. Many more subjects of the God-Emperor who had the misfortune of finding themselves in the Dark City became victims of his vile manipulations.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le Culte de la Soif Fatale, excédé, punit tous ceux qui avaient aidé {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}, le commissaire parvint à survivre contre toute attente. Il conclut des marchés abjects et échangea de nombreuses vies contre la sienne afin de se procurer le soutien de nouveaux bienfaiteurs. Bon nombre des sujets de l'Empereur-Dieu qui eurent le malheur de se retrouver dans la Cité Crépusculaire furent victimes de ses odieuses machinations.

languages.text: Cuando el enfurecido Culto de la Sed Letal castigó a todos los que ayudaron a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, el traidor conocido como el Comisario sobrevivió, contra todo pronóstico. Con tratos repugnantes y comprando su vida con las de otros, encontró nuevos benefactores. Muchos más súbditos del Dios Emperador tan desdichados como para acabar en la Ciudad Siniestra sufrieron sus viles manipulaciones.
languages.original_text: When the enraged Cult of the Fatal Thirst punished everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader, the traitor known as the Commissar survived against all odds. Making despicable deals and buying his own life with the lives of others, he found new benefactors. Many more subjects of the God-Emperor who had the misfortune of finding themselves in the Dark City became victims of his vile manipulations.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el enfurecido Culto de la Sed Letal castigó a todos los que ayudaron a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, el traidor conocido como el Comisario sobrevivió, contra todo pronóstico. Con tratos repugnantes y comprando su vida con las de otros, encontró nuevos benefactores. Muchos más súbditos del Dios Emperador tan desdichados como para acabar en la Ciudad Siniestra sufrieron sus viles maquinaciones.

languages.text: 怒り狂った「宿命の渇き」教団が自由開拓者に強力した者たち全員を処罰したとき、コミッサーとして知られる裏切り者は、あらゆる困難を乗り越えて生き残った。卑劣な取引を行い、他人の命で自分の命を買い、彼は新たな後見者を見つけた。不幸にも仄暗き都に身を置くことになった神帝陛下の臣下たちの多くが、彼の卑劣な策略の犠牲となった。
languages.original_text: When the enraged Cult of the Fatal Thirst punished everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader, the traitor known as the Commissar survived against all odds. Making despicable deals and buying his own life with the lives of others, he found new benefactors. Many more subjects of the God-Emperor who had the misfortune of finding themselves in the Dark City became victims of his vile manipulations.

traits.locale_text: 怒り狂った「宿命の渇き」教団が自由開拓者に強力した者たち全員を処罰したとき、コミッサーとして知られる裏切り者は、あらゆる困難を乗り越えて生き残った。卑劣な取引を行い、他人の命で自分の命を買い、彼は新たな後見者を見つけた。不幸にも仄暗き都に身を置くことになった神帝陛下の臣下たちの多くが、彼の卑劣な策略の犠牲となった。

languages.text: Ölüme Susamışlığın Tarikatı, Hür Tacir'e yardım eden herkesi cezalandırırken Komiser olarak bilinen hain, her şeye rağmen hayatta kaldı. Alçakça anlaşmalar yaptı, kendi canını başkalarınınkiyle takas etti ve yeni iş birlikçiler buldu. Tanrı İmparator'un kendini Kara Şehir'de bulan talihsiz tebaası, onun adi manipülasyonlarına daha da çok kurban gider oldu.
languages.original_text: When the enraged Cult of the Fatal Thirst punished everyone who had helped the Rogue Trader, the traitor known as the Commissar survived against all odds. Making despicable deals and buying his own life with the lives of others, he found new benefactors. Many more subjects of the God-Emperor who had the misfortune of finding themselves in the Dark City became victims of his vile manipulations.

traits.locale_text: Ölüme Susamışlığın Tarikatı, Hür Tacir'e yardım eden herkesi cezalandırırken, Komiser olarak bilinen hain her şeye rağmen hayatta kaldı. Alçakça anlaşmalar yaptı, kendi yaşamını başkalarının yaşamıyla takas etti ve yeni iş birlikçiler buldu. Tanrı İmparator'un kendini Kara Şehir'de bulan talihsiz tebaaları, onun adi manipülasyonlarına çok daha fazla kurban gitmeye başladı.
